name: Dylan Arnold
description: American actor known for his roles in 'Halloween' and 'You'.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Dylan Arnold is an American actor born on February 11, 1994. Raised in Seattle, Washington, Arnold began acting in local theater productions before pursuing his dreams in the film industry.

content.title: Career
content.body: Dylan Arnold gained prominence with his breakout role in the horror film **'Halloween' (2018)** as Cameron Elam, and reprised his role in the sequel **'Halloween Kills' (2021)**. His other notable work includes the Netflix series **'You'**, where he played Theo Engler. Known for his ability to bring depth to complex characters, Arnold continues to expand his range with diverse roles in both film and television.
